mapper.update:
UPDATE data_match_stat SET
data_match_stat.MatchId = #{ matchId },
data_match_stat.ClubId = #{ clubId },
data_match_stat.ClubType = #{ clubType },
data_match_stat.ToShoot = #{ toShoot },
data_match_stat.InTarget = #{ inTarget },
data_match_stat.MissGoals = #{ missGoals },
data_match_stat.HitWoodwork = #{ hitWoodwork },
data_match_stat.SpotKick = #{ spotKick },
data_match_stat.PassTimes = #{ passTimes },
data_match_stat.ThroughPass = #{ throughPass },
data_match_stat.Offside = #{ offside },
data_match_stat.Steal = #{ steal },
data_match_stat.FreeKick = #{ freeKick },
data_match_stat.Corner = #{ corner },
data_match_stat.OutOfBounds = #{ outOfBounds },
data_match_stat.PassCompl = #{ passCompl },
data_match_stat.PassMiddle = #{ passMiddle },
data_match_stat.StealRate = #{ stealRate },
data_match_stat.Possession = #{ possession },
data_match_stat.Fouls = #{ fouls },
data_match_stat.RedCards = #{ redCards },
data_match_stat.YellowCards = #{ yellowCards },
data_match_stat.Injury = #{ injury },
data_match_stat.Year = #{ year },
data_match_stat.CreatedAt = #{ createdAt },
data_match_stat.UpdatedAt = #{ updatedAt },
data_match_stat.Pauses = #{ pauses },
data_match_stat.RealMatchAt = #{ realMatchAt },
data_match_stat.RunningDis = #{ runningDis },
data_match_stat.DoubleYCards = #{ doubleYCards }
WHERE id= #{id}
